original: @134b 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo; ;t'a re t'a re t'a r'a ya /
analyzed: @134b 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo; ;t'a re t'a re t'a r'a ya /

original: ban dha mo tsa ni sv'a h'a /
analyzed: ban dha mo tsa ni sv'a h'a /

original: 'phags pa'i sngags de bzlas brjod byas na bcings pa las grol bar byed do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i sngags de bzlas brjod byas na bcings pa las grol bar byed do //
translated: If one recites this mantra of the noble one, it will liberate one from bondage.

original: bcings pa las grol ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: bcings pa las grol ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The dhāraṇī of liberation from bondage is complete.
